profiles.name: Charge Rail: 5
profiles.effect: The Angrvall roars to life, readying itself to unleash it's wrath. - Firing now will deliver 1d6 kinetic damage.

profiles.name: Charge Rail: 4
profiles.effect: The Angrvall roars once more as it's turbine starts to spin up the spear, the spear tip hardens with Floatine. - Firing now will deliver 2d6 kinetic damage with 10 AP

profiles.name: Charge Rail: 3
profiles.effect: Sparks fly out of the Angrvall launcher, a soft green glow emits from the tip of the spear. - Firing now will deliver 3d6 Kinetic damage with 20 AP and blast 2

profiles.name: Charge Rail: 2
profiles.effect: Heat emits from the Angrvall Launcher, the launcher spins rapidly. - Firing now will deliver 4d6 explosive damage in addition to 30 AP and blast 3

profiles.name: Charge Rail: 1
profiles.effect: The Angrvall starts to creak as it buckles under the heat, you aren't sure if it would be smart to overcharge it... - Firing now will deliver 5d6 explosive damage in addition to 40 AP

profiles.name: Charge Rail: Angrvadall
profiles.effect: The spear is ready, the weapon feared by the Union, is primed once more, unleash the Angrvadall upon your foes! - Firing now will deliver a deadly blow of 6d6 in addition to AP 100 and blast 4

tags.name: Loading
tags.description: This weapon must be reloaded after each use. Mechs can reload with Stabilize and some systems.

name: Holy Light Beam Cannon
description:
The Holy Light Beam Cannon - otherwise known as Holy light or HLBC, is a testament to Knights Manufacturing's ambition, presenting the pinnacle of the limited energy weapon development KM has performed.
Going with the trend of old Cradle Arthurian legends, the HLBC is mean to inspire awe, fear and evoke the image of divine retribution. The charging sequence of the HLBC is a spectacle on its own, as energy seemingly comes out of nowhere (while in reality it is being released through tiny spikes on the capacitor units), quickly filling the firing chamber with a shining, golden light, adding to the sense of imagery of a divine weapon. Once a weapon that was often used to protect the population of KM factory worlds, now has become twisted, used by Fields Network to perform deeds beyond reasoning.
